description:
Kedo has returned to the mamodo world.  Dr. Riddles quickly picks himself up and leads the way further into the ruin. Kiyo’s team finally encounters the powerful hidden mamodo who has been controlling the deadly stars. His name is Pamoon. While Kiyo is sc
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senkou Ranbu! Kokou no Senshi Pamoon
閃光乱舞! 孤高の戦士パムーン
